verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Calvari guttameedanu durmargavairulu Dweshinchi silva medanu sri Yesunjampiri{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sri Yesu shramalanniyu ne nenchajalanu Nannun rakshinchulaguna pranambu bettenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ne jeeva mondulaaguna chavunu pondenu Nannun rakshimpa shramanu sri Yesu pondenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sri Yesu gaka guruvu lerinka naakunu Naa vanti paapulellarin rakshimpa vachchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa Yesu prema goppadi yamoolyamainadi Nepremathonu Yesunu sevinthu nithyamu{/lang-eng}
